text: TAME (TAME EP Linea Aerea del Ecuador), is the flag carrier and the largest airline of Ecuador.Danny Palmerlee, Ecuador & the Gal√°pagos Islands (Melbourne: Lonely Planet, 2003), p. 81 They are based in Quito, Pichincha. Its main hub is Mariscal Sucre International Airport in Quito. ==References== Category:Airlines of South America Category:Organizations based in Ecuador
title: TAME
